newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan stock extend gains on electronics.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan stock extend gains on electronics.

text.p: Taiwan share prices extended early gains in late Wednesday trade, testing resistance at 9,600 points as electronics again rose sharply to lead the upswing in defiance of central bank market-cooling moves, brokers said.
With 65 minutes left, at 0250 GMT, the benchmark stock index was up 74.32 points or 0.78 percent at 9,630.30.
Turnover was very heavy at T$169.7 billion.
"Electronics remain the day's star, rising sharply amid expected earnings reports and increased commercial orders from the high-tech industry," said Perry Chou of Taiwan Securities Investment.
